com.firebase.authwrapper.providers.types

Class MailProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.firebase.authwrapper.providers.common.base.ProviderBase
      • com.firebase.authwrapper.providers.types.MailProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IProvider

    public class MailProvider
extends ProviderBase
implements IProvider
    Facebook Provider concrete class. This class implements IProvider interface and ProviderBase abstract methods based on email/firebase provider functions
    Since:
    10-5-2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    ron barnoy
    See Also:
    Provider

    • Method Detail

      • SendEmailVerification

        public void SendEmailVerification(com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseUser firebaseuser)
        Description copied from class: ProviderBase

        This method is used for sending verification mail to the current user, after this user was successfully registered by using MailProvider

        The reason that this method is found in ProviderBase (and not exclusively found in MailProvider) is that this method must be exposed to the end user. This can only be done if it will be exposed to Provider delegate object.

        Specified by:
        SendEmailVerification in interface IProvider
        Overrides:
        SendEmailVerification in class ProviderBase
        Parameters:
        firebaseuser - target user for mail verification required for MailProvider
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        See Also:
        ProviderBase.SendEmailVerification(FirebaseUser)

      • SignIn

        public void SignIn(java.lang.String email,
                   java.lang.String password,
                   AuthenticationListener.Email emailCallback)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Implementation of email sign in provider using firebasework This implementation based on abstract method found in ProviderBase.SignIn(String, String, AuthenticationListener.Email)
        Specified by:
        SignIn in interface IProvider
        Overrides:
        SignIn in class ProviderBase
        Parameters:
        email - the firebase user email address
        password - the firebase user password
        emailCallback - the registered callback. This callback will be notified of the signin procedure
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - this exception is triggered only if other concrete provider (either of MailProvider called this method.
        See Also:
        MailProvider
